page.title: 14SCHOOL CLUBS
page.content: We have a hall with all the indoor sports equipment ,for {Physical {Education.}There is a Table Tenis club and a Gymnastic club. We have football and cricket and netball teams first and second.We have a pond with many different insects and plants in it.We have only just built the pond and the man in charge of the Derbyshire Naturalists Trust came to open it.We also have a wild area,the wild area has got trees grasses,plants,and insects in it.We have also planted some wild seeds in the wild area.
